option.name: originalContent
updatedContent
originalContent
updatedContent
originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!DOCTYPE hibernate-configuration PUBLIC "-//Hibernate/Hibernate Configuration DTD 3.0//EN" "http://www.hibernate.org/dtd/hibernate-configuration-3.0.dtd"> <hibernate-configuration> <session-factory> <!-- Database connection settings --> <property name="hibernate.connection.driver_class">com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver</property> <property name="hibernate.connection.url">jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/infaq?useSSL=false&serverTimezone=UTC</property> <property name="hibernate.connection.username">root</property> <property name="hibernate.connection.password">Raachid6789@@@@</property>
<!-- JDBC connection pool settings --> <property name="hibernate.connection.pool_size">10</property>
<!-- SQL dialect --> <property name="hibernate.dialect">org.hibernate.dialect.MySQLDialect</property>
<!-- Print all executed SQL --> <property name="hibernate.show_sql">true</property> <property name="hibernate.format_sql">true</property>
<!-- Drop and re-create the database schema on startup -->
<property name="hibernate.hbm2ddl.auto">update</property>
<!-- Disable the second-level cache --> <property name="hibernate.cache.use_second_level_cache">false</property>
<!-- Current session context --> <property name="hibernate.current_session_context_class">thread</property> <!-- Enable Lazy Loading --> <property name="hibernate.enable_lazy_load_no_trans">true</property>
<!-- Mapping classes --> <mapping class="com.donations.model.User"/> <mapping class="com.donations.model.Post"/> <mapping class="com.donations.model.Like"/> <mapping class="com.donations.model.Donation"/> <mapping class="com.donations.model.Comment"/> <mapping class="com.donations.model.SavedPost"/> </session-factory> </hibernate-configuration>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!DOCTYPE hibernate-configuration PUBLIC "-//Hibernate/Hibernate Configuration DTD 3.0//EN" "http://www.hibernate.org/dtd/hibernate-configuration-3.0.dtd"> <hibernate-configuration> <session-factory> <!-- Database connection settings --> <property name="hibernate.connection.driver_class">com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver</property> <property name="hibernate.connection.url">jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/infaq?useSSL=false&serverTimezone=UTC</property> <property name="hibernate.connection.username">root</property> <property name="hibernate.connection.password">Raachid6789@@@@</property>
<!-- JDBC connection pool settings --> <property name="hibernate.connection.pool_size">10</property>
<!-- SQL dialect --> <property name="hibernate.dialect">org.hibernate.dialect.MySQLDialect</property>
<!-- Print all executed SQL --> <property name="hibernate.show_sql">true</property> <property name="hibernate.format_sql">true</property>
<!-- Drop and re-create the database schema on startup -->
<property name="hibernate.hbm2ddl.auto">update</property>
<!-- Disable the second-level cache --> <property name="hibernate.cache.use_second_level_cache">false</property>
<!-- Current session context --> <property name="hibernate.current_session_context_class">thread</property> <!-- Enable Lazy Loading --> <property name="hibernate.enable_lazy_load_no_trans">true</property>
<!-- Mapping classes --> <mapping class="com.donations.model.User"/> <mapping class="com.donations.model.Post"/> <mapping class="com.donations.model.Like"/> <mapping class="com.donations.model.Donation"/> <mapping class="com.donations.model.Comment"/> <mapping class="com.donations.model.SavedPost"/> </session-factory> </hibernate-configuration>
